title: Country & City you would like to stay for a short time

singleItemContent: Tell me a little about your hometown.
Which part of your country  do most people live in?
Tell me about the main industries in your country.
What are some of the good things and some of the bad things about
Describe another City you would like to stay for a short time
Whom you will go there with
And explain why you will stay there just for a short time
1.Why do people sometimes go to other cities?
3.Do you think tourist may come across bad things in other cities?
